snippet.title: Rat Climber Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
The full Rat Climber game is out now!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3085180/Rat_Climber

(free demo also available on steam and itch.io) 

You are a rat. You must climb. Reach the top, claim the cheese!

In Rat Climber, you only have one goal: reach the top of the world. 

You must navigate vertical labyrinth levels and make daring jumps, but be careful; one false move and you go tumbling down.

There are no stinky collectibles- Just climb and explore! There might be a secret cheese wedge in every zone though...who knows what will happen if you find all seven?

Every object has exact, precise collision- 
If there's a small hole or ledge, you can probably walk on it or fit inside. You must think outside the box of traditional platformers and start thinking like a rat to progress up the vertical labyrinth worlds.

There are no power ups or unlockable moves- 
There are only 3 controls: Jump, dash, and walkThe dash lets you jump farther and slightly higher.The walk allows for precise movement and prevents you from walking off of ledges.

If you fall, there's a chance you could recover progress due to the nature of the world having each zone stacked above the previous one, and the fact that you still have some airborne control, but it's not guaranteed. 

Can you guide Ratty to the top of the world and reach cheese heaven? Try your skills in the best 3D ratformer ever made!
